meanings.definition: Not mapped or surveyed; unknown or unexplored.
meanings.sent1: The adventurers ventured into the uncharted forest, hoping to discover hidden treasures.
meanings.sent2: The explorers were excited to explore the uncharted territory, eager to map out new lands.
meanings.sent3: The uncharted waters held mysteries that even the bravest sailors feared to uncover.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like an uncharted map, full of undiscovered paths and hidden secrets.
meanings.sent5: The uncharted mountain range loomed in the distance, shrouded in mystery and intrigue.

meanings.definition: Not recorded or plotted on a map or chart.
meanings.sent1: The ancient ruins remained uncharted, waiting for archaeologists to uncover their history.
meanings.sent2: The uncharted caves were rumored to hold ancient artifacts yet to be discovered.
meanings.sent3: The uncharted island seemed to disappear from maps, as if it had a mind of its own.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were like uncharted territories, with no clear direction or destination.
meanings.sent5: The uncharted stars twinkled in the night sky, guiding sailors on their unknown journey.
